name: Aquatics - Parent and Tot Swim
description: This class will teach parents basic water safety while introducing tots to new skills and fun. Songs, water safety, entering and exiting the water, and holding techniques for the parents are some topics covered in this lesson. Infants or Toddlers must be accompanied in the water by their caregiver. Children are required to wear swim diapers while in the pool.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (415) 831-6800
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
i am part of a family with children under 18 years old.
